entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runtime constants in attributes #108416
  • Experiencing SafeHandle disposed issue #108408
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree == stmt->GetRootNode()' #108406
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.Native termios c_iflag settings ignored? #108404
  • ARM64-SVE: Additions with GetActiveElementCount() should use incp #108400
  • [Mono Runtime] why is the garbage collector not doing its job? #108397
  • Starting many threaded processes breaks asynchronous read operations when using WaitForExit(int) #108395
  • ARM64-SVE: `TestFirstTrue()` can be optimised away when using `CreateTrueMask()` #108392
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE: Add signed versions of the CreateWhileLessThanMask APIs #108384
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException: Invalid argument when buffers count is greater than 1024 #108383
  • Backporting fixes to SmtpClient #108382
  • All file enumerations methods fail with System.IO.IOException: 'An unexpected network error occurred' when enumerating large network foler structures #108381
  • Test Failure: JIT/Methodical/cctor/xassem/xprecise1_cs_do/xprecise1_cs_do.cmd #108375

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108361
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Alpine packaging #83789
    Future
  • .NET 9 Vector128.Min/Max performance regression #108168
  • ILC is hitting a NullReferenceException when processing linker XML from an assembly #108031
  • LibraryImport fails with 0xC0000005 code, but DllImport not #108399
  • "Enhanced precision" of DateTimeOffset Add methods results in incorrect value #108362
    Future
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces does not work correctly on some iOS devices #106577
  • Creating a System.Net.Sockets.Socket on iOS17 devices is not reliable and can crash the runtime #106587
  • How to use proxy on Windows and Linux when PAC file is used #106933
  • Test failure: Assertion failed 'likelihood <= 1.0' #108100
    10.0.0
  • Is it possible to prompt for user certificate selection on iOS in the same way we can prompt on Android using KeyChain.ChooseX509Certificate2WithPrivateKeyAsync #108252
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ValidationResult constructor with a single member name #108338
    Future
  • Uri.TryCreate Returns True For Uris That Are Not Absolute - Linux #108221
  • [wasm] LibraryTests_Threading test failure during assembly load #108394
    10.0.0
  • There is no good way to tell if a service is added when using Keyed Services #108346
  • Timeout at System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits #106596
    10.0.0
  • JsonElement vs JsonDocument Parse: why no UseArrayPools #108157
  • Exporting Certificate with a password always chooses SHA1-3DES encryption #108330
  • Incorrect value provided by DirectoryInfo.Attributes when directory does not exist #108345
  • Support IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #72909
    Future
  • Build dotnet cli on qnx? #32867

PullRequests

Created

  • [GC] Revert distribute_free_regions changes in preparation for different strategy #108417
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108415
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update field references in property accessors #108413
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0][PERF] Backport python pipeline changes for performance tests #108412
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix wording around when objects are entering degraded gc mode #108411
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix flag assignment in pal_termios #108409
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Couple minor docs updates #108407
    area-Meta
  • [cdac] Implement NibbleMap lookup and tests #108403
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove pre-LSRA `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #108402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, community-contribution, area-Threading-mono
  • Remove OverflowException for ReadCborNegativeIntegerRepresentation #108398
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • feat: makes GeneratedCodeAttribute constructor parameters optional #108393
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Dispose Xunit ToolCommand - follow up #108387
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException when buffers total size greater than 2GB #108380
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Allow devirt into abstract classes if we saw a non-abstract child #108379
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: remove some unnecessary DONT_REMOVE block flags #108405
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108410
    area-Meta
  • Enable IDynamicInterfaceCastable tests disabled on fixed bug #108376
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [PERF] Pass ScenarioArgs for scenario performance tests #108303
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: use bbID for pred list ordering #108357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #108282
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Revert `Linux_arm` images to `ubuntu-16.04` #108396
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.36
  • Remove duplicate code in `DiagnosticsHandler` #108012
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add notifications for area-Interop-coreclr #108378
    area-Meta
  • Move computation of `DebuggerAssemblyControlFlags` from `DomainAssembly` to `Assembly` #107809
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108348
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #108235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Dispose Xunit ToolCommand #108319
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Modify several atomic instructions in nativeaot. #108377
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64

Updated

  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Update `field` references in property accessors #108222
    area-Meta
  • Share pthread_setname via minipal #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] fix guid version > 7 #108351
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fixed dependency injection event source tests randomly failing. #107465
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix resolving types with primary constructors using in parameters #105928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Move TLS tests to unsupported list #107236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add comments to host error_codes.h #107775
    area-Host
  • Test NuGet bug fix #108337
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Enable policheck and tsa #108340
    area-Meta
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #108145
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • Trying to support changing member accessibility #108350
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add runtime check for unwind get_proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Fold some casts early in importer #108356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix partial compilation for CETCOMPAT mode #108062
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2549582 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] fix the building error for "PalInterlockedCompareExchange128" #108364
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add Support for Vector512 in BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness (#108204) #108205
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Add sampling profiler #108083
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
